name: Angry Red Ball - 2k17 Edition
description:
Angry Red Ball - 2k17 Edition Game takes you on adventures in awesome world through run and jump and collect coins, In this game will face evil monsters in your life and you have to avoid them by jumping over them and other obstacles, you are living a forest adventure in your own planet..

How To Play:

- Catch the coins for score and run faster with the ball.
- Mind the stars and the obstacles on the road.
- Tap To jump
- Press left or right button to rolling the ball
- The dumb way to die is to touch one of the monsters there !

Features :

- Physics-based Dash platforming
- 6 Awesome world
- 50 Levels Clean and colorful graphics
- Very funny.

Download Now
Play & Enjoy
